_sText:
From TF2 map remake for CS:S added capture the flags no change layout & 3 maps included, 2 scoreboard sides on 3D skybox make look nice bigger scoreboard & HDR lights & some weapons pick up. 

I used TopHATTwaffle's textures & re edit texture removed black edge flag then put on banner flag.

- 1 flag map - 1 flag on top tower on middle castle.
- 2 flags map - 2 flags both sides near spawn area.
- 5 flags map - 5 flags 2 underground & 2 on ground & 1 top tall tower.
